data.title: Call of Duty: Warzone In-Game Account Registration
data.text:
The in-game Account Creation screen requires entering a Display Name, a valid email address, and a password. You'll also need to set your region and decide whether or not you'd like to receive marketing emails before confirming your account. You can also create an account online.

After accepting the Call of Duty Account Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, your account registration will be complete, and your Account Summary will display.

Note that your Account Summary includes your Activision ID, which is the name you'll appear as in the game.

Important! When creating an Activision account, be sure to use a valid email address that you can access. Account verification emails will be sent to validate your account ownership if you wish to

link or unlink accounts;

change the account's email address or password;

change your Activision ID;

sign up for two-factor authentication.

After signing up or logging in, you'll see your Activision ID, also referred to as your Display Name. Activision IDs include a hash mark followed by a series of numbers (ex: DisplayName#1234567), which is unique to your Activision account and allows players with the same PSN ID, Gamertag, BattleTag, or SteamID to keep their names while differentiating them in the game. The numbers also make account creation easier, eliminating the need to see if a name is available.

You can change your Activision ID/Display Name with a Username change token. You'll receive a new Username change token every six months, and you can carry up to two tokens at any given time.

To change your Activision ID/Display Name in the game, head to the Activision Account screen.

Press Options on the home screen.

Go to the ACCOUNT tab and select Activision Account.

Choose CHANGE DISPLAY NAME.

Enter your desired name and choose CONFIRM.

You can also change your Activision ID/Display Name online.

Log in to your Activision account.

Select BASIC INFO.

Select EDIT next to your ACTIVISION ID.

In the ACCOUNT VERIFICATION REQUIRED pop-up, select SEND CODE.

Go to your email account to retrieve the one-time verification code.

Return to the ACCOUNT VERIFICATION REQUIRED pop-up and enter the code.

On the BASIC INFO tab and select EDIT next to your ACTIVISION ID.

Enter a new Activision ID/Display Name and select SAVE.

Enter the password for your Activision account.

Select SUBMIT.
